post.text: For 30 years -- 30 YEARS -- Hillary Clinton hasn't fixed anything. In fact, her only experience has been at failing. As President, believe me, there will be dramatic change. We are going to get things DONE! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Alex
comment.text: Mr.Trump I seen on fox the amount of people lying hillary and Bernie has at they're rallie and I laughed at the lying media pumping her up not working is it love u start telling the truth about bill and Hillary do it now
